message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a great deal. I'm offering it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I understand that $150 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering it to you for $130.
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but $130 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting far away from the value I have in mind. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm offering it to you for $125.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $125 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not ready to give up. I'm willing to meet you at $122.50. This is my final concession.

I appreciate your final concession, but $122.50 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John.
